quotes.content: I'm sick of following my dreams, man. I'm just going to ask where they're going and hook up with them later.
“My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you are a banana.”
Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence in society.
Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can not do it in one push; you got to rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.
